Blog.post: I hAve simplY had enoUgh of Life... Even tHo someTimes it feels like life Is Useless... I wilL never GivE up.. I will always stride to the next LevEl... Never to bE defeated by any Obsticle that getS in my Way... Even tho It seemS useless I musT Be StroNg

You can't just say to yourself that things are okay because they aren't. They will never be okay until you put them to eternal rest. You must forget and shallow the pain pretending as if it's a watermelon without any seeds. And so I say to you move on to a new beginning and leave behind your old trail map for someone else to pick up and try to follow in your footsteps to achieve the goal that you easily lost.

As I sit here on a humid night I realize that thinGs pass bY quiCker thaN expected...When all your fun has gone you sit in a dark place with no one to occupy your brain...it almost feels Like death but in reality your just another step away from taking youR next breath...as the dayS go On you will realize where did all that time go...and Then IT hitS you...itS been by YOUR side through thick and thin... JOE C. 06/10/04
they're staring at you they're laughing pointing fingers do you shug ur shoulders and move on or do you take charge whats the point they will still make fun no matter what
What are you waiting for its right in front of you reach out and grab it its not that hard what is stopping you? who is in your way? are you afraid?
my soul is lost its drifting away never to be found it is gone will i get it back? i am scared i am confused i don't know what to do where am i? I need to find myself

There's a feeling inside that I can't seem to describe its about a girl who has my heart in the palm of her hands she grips it tightly brings me pain everyday there is no solution nothing will ever be fixed its up to me i have nothing to lose what am i going to do? that's a question that is asked by many they can't seem to figure me out i am not strange or wierd iam just different in my own little way but what am i going to do? its an unsolved mystery not even i kno but one day itll come to me give me time be patient be quiet stare and scratch you head i dont mind i understand

never believe the rich listen to what the poor have to say for they know the meaning of life never tell the truth always tell lies for the truth may hurt more break the law at your own free will let nothing stop you always persist no matter what it takes you must sacrifice and hold on to your inner-self cause thats your first priority you come first and only you all your friends are not your friends for they will stab you in the back when you need them most they will turn there heads away when you need them most but they will always come to you when they need you most...

It circles around my body flowing through the air staring me in the eyes watching my every move challenging my every thought grinning at my emotions it tests me i dont know what to do i must defeat it it has to go away but my feelings for you will always be around to stay..

Losing Myself piece by piece I am falling apart I can't stop it It can't be prevented death is coming are you ready? complete nothingness is knocking you must answer the door you are at home your not in the shower and your not taking a nap your excuses are gone so face death stare it in the eyes and accept the fact that its your time
